locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Author DOI Screening Plugin
DOI Screening
Authors can only publish if they have previous journal articles published in the last 2 years
You need to have at least one published journal article in the last 2 years
Please insert DOIs from previous articles of your own authorship published in peer reviewed journals. You must enter two DOIs from the past 2 years or three DOIs from any date
First DOI
Second DOI
Third DOI
Please, provide a valid DOI
DOI cannot be the same
Please, abide by the rules set out above
Only DOIs from Crossref are allowed
Please, enter a DOI of yours
Please, enter a DOI of a journal publication
Operation performed successfully!
Make screening
You need to perform this step!
To proceed automatically with the submission, you must do a screening of your previous publications. Otherwise, your submission will need to be approved by a moderator.
If you can't do the screening, select the checkbox below:
I don't have the requested DOIs to provide
